content:

inventory=[{"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 49, "index": 10}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 26, "index": 12}, {"type": "water_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 18, "index": 25}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 11, "index": 28}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}]

Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1
